QuestData.Title: Turning the Tide
QuestData.Description: There is only one true way to end the fel orc threat to Honor Hold and the Alliance.$B$BTheir Warchief must be slain.$B$BBring me his namesake weapon, so that we can always remember his death.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Eliminating him is a key goal in this war.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Warchief Kargath's Fist to Advance Scout Chadwick inside the Shattered Halls of Hellfire Citadel.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you returned with proof of 'Warchief' Kargath Bladefist's demise?
QuestData.RewardText: We have struck a major blow against the enemy with your help.$B$BHonor Hold is far safer than it's been in years.
